arts.ttl: Slot's silver lining: Liverpool receive injury boost after Palace EFL Cup defeat
arts.sum: Liverpool receive a silver lining after their 3-0 EFL Cup loss to Crystal Palace, as Arne Slot reveals that an injured star has a "good chance" of coming back for the weekend's Premier League clash with Aston Villa.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot's biggest mistake against Crystal Palace wasn't the starting XI, it was something far worse - opinion
Sarr strikes twice as Palace punish Slot's 'surprising' Liverpool selection
arts.sum: Liverpool suffered defeat once again - but it was Arne Slot's 'surprising' team selection which helped Crystal Palace to an easy 3-0 victory at Anfield and a place in the Carabao Cup quarter-finals.

arts.ttl: Liverpool vs. Crystal Palace: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: Liverpool and Crystal Palace lock horns for the third time this season when they clash in the Carabao Cup fourth round at Anfield on Wednesday evening. Their fourth straight Premier League defeat and fifth loss in their last six matches has alarm bells ringing, with Arne Slot under pressure to turn performances and results around swiftly after the summer‚Äôs gargantuan transfer spend.
